Protocols/VersaPlayerPlaybackDelegate.ht.name: playbackShouldBegin(player:)
Protocols/VersaPlayerPlaybackDelegate.ht.abstract: Whether if playback should begin on specified player

Protocols/VersaPlayerPlaybackDelegate.ht.name: playbackReady(player:)
Protocols/VersaPlayerPlaybackDelegate.ht.abstract: Notifies when playback is ready to play

Protocols/VersaPlayerPlaybackDelegate.ht.name: playbackDidFailed(with:)
Protocols/VersaPlayerPlaybackDelegate.ht.abstract: Notifies when playback fails with an error

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.name: playPauseButton
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: VersaStatefulButton instance to represent the play/pause button

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.name: fullscreenButton
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: VersaStatefulButton instance to represent the fullscreen toggle button

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.name: pipButton
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: VersaStatefulButton instance to represent the PIP button

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.name: rewindButton
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: VersaStatefulButton instance to represent the rewind button

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.name: forwardButton
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: VersaStatefulButton instance to represent the forward button

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.name: skipForwardButton
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: VersaStatefulButton instance to represent the skip forward button

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.name: skipBackwardButton
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: VersaStatefulButton instance to represent the skip backward button

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.name: seekbarSlider
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: VersaSeekbarSlider instance to represent the seekbar slider

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.name: currentTimeLabel
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: VersaTimeLabel instance to represent the current time label

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.name: totalTimeLabel
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/c:@M@V.abstract: VersaTimeLabel instance to represent the total time label

Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/s:24Ve.name: skipSize
Classes/VersaPlayerControls.html#/s:24Ve.abstract: Skip size in seconds to be used for skipping forward or backwards

Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.name: decryptionDelegate
Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.abstract: VersaPlayerDecryptionDelegate instance to be used only when a VPlayer item with isEncrypted = true is passed

Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.name: autoplay
Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.abstract: Whether it should autoplay when adding a VPlayerItem

Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.name: isPipModeEnabled
Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.abstract: Whether PIP Mode is enabled via pipController

Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.name: addExtension(extension:with:)
Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.abstract: Add a VersaPlayerExtension instance to the current player

Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.name: getExtension(with:)
Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.abstract: Retrieves the instance of the VersaPlayerExtension with the name given

Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.name: layout(view:into:)
Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.abstract: Layout a view within another view stretching to edges

Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.name: setNativePip(enabled:)
Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.abstract: Enables or disables PIP when available (when device is supported)

Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.name: controls
Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.abstract: VersaPlayerControls instance being used to display controls

Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.name: use(controls:with:)
Classes/VersaPlayerView.html#/s:24VersaP.abstract: VersaPlayerControls instance to display controls in player, using VersaPlayerGestureRecieverView instance

Classes/VersaPlayerGestureRecieverView.h.name: ready
Classes/VersaPlayerGestureRecieverView.h.abstract: Whether or not reciever view is ready

Classes/VersaPlayerControlsBehaviour.htm.name: shouldHideControls
Classes/VersaPlayerControlsBehaviour.htm.abstract: Whether controls should be hidden when showingControls is true

Classes/VersaPlayerControlsBehaviour.htm.name: shouldShowControls
Classes/VersaPlayerControlsBehaviour.htm.abstract: Whether controls should be shown when showingControls is false

Classes/VersaPlayerControlsBehaviour.htm.name: elapsedTime
Classes/VersaPlayerControlsBehaviour.htm.abstract: Elapsed time between controls being shown and current time

Classes/VersaPlayerRenderingView.html#/s.name: renderingLayer
Classes/VersaPlayerRenderingView.html#/s.abstract: VPlayerLayer instance used to render player content

Classes/VersaPlayerExtension.html#/s:24V.name: prepare()
Classes/VersaPlayerExtension.html#/s:24V.abstract: Make preparations for the extension such as modifying the view

Classes/VersaPlayerItem.html#/s:24VersaP.name: isEncrypted
Classes/VersaPlayerItem.html#/s:24VersaP.abstract: whether content passed through the asset is encrypted and should be decrypted

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(alignment:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be one of the CFString constants in Alignment Type Constants indicating the alignment in the writing direction of the first line of text of the cue. The writing direction is indicated by the value (or absence) of the kCMTextMarkupAttribute_VerticalLayout attribute. The default value of this attribute is kCMTextMarkupAlignmentType_Middle.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(boldStyle:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a CFBoolean. The default is kCFBooleanFalse. If this attribute is kCFBooleanTrue, the text will be drawn with a bold style. Other styles such as italic may or may not be used as well.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(italicStyle:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a CFBoolean. The default is kCFBooleanFalse. If this attribute is kCFBooleanTrue, the text will be rendered with an italic style. Other styles such as bold may or may not be used as well.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(fontFamilyName:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a CFString holding the family name of an installed font (for example, Helvetica) that is used to render and/or measure text.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(underlineStyle:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a CFBoolean. The default is kCFBooleanFalse. If this attribute is kCFBooleanTrue, the text will be rendered with an underline. Other styles such as bold may or may not be used as well.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(verticalLayout:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be one of the CFString constants in Vertical Layout Constants indicating the progression direction for new vertical lines of text. If this attribute is present, it indicates the writing direction is vertical. The attribute value indicates whether new vertical text lines are added from left to right or from right to left. If this attribute is missing, the writing direction is horizontal.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(relativeFontSize:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a non-negative CFNumber. This is a number holding a percentage of the size of the calculated default font size. A value of 120 indicates 20% larger than the default font size. A value of 80 indicates 80% of the default font size. The default value of 100 indicates no size difference.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(characterEdgeStyle:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be one of the CFString constants in Character Edge Style Constants that control the shape of the edges of drawn characters. The default value is kCMTextMarkupCharacterEdgeStyle_None.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(backgroundColorARGB:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a CFArray of 4 CFNumbers representing alpha, red, green, and blue fields with values between 0.0 and 1.0. The red, green and blue components are interpreted in the sRGB color space. The alpha indicates the opacity from 0.0 for transparent to 1.0 for 100% opaque.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(foregroundColorARGB:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a CFArray of 4 CFNumbers representing alpha, red, green, and blue fields with values between 0.0 and 1.0. The red, green and blue components are interpreted in the sRGB color space. The alpha indicates the opacity from 0.0 for transparent to 1.0 for 100% opaque.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(genericFontFamilyName:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be one of the CFString constants in Generic Font Names. Generic fonts must be mapped to the family name of an installed font before rendering and/or measuring text (see Media Accessibility Function).

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(characterBackgroundColorARGB:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a CFArray of 4 CFNumbers representing alpha, red, green, and blue fields with values between 0.0 and 1.0. The red, green and blue components are interpreted in the sRGB color space. The alpha indicates the opacity from 0.0 for transparent to 1.0 for 100% opaque.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(writingDirectionSizePercentage:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a non-negative CFNumber. This is a number expressing the width of the bounding box for text layout as a percentage of the video frame’s dimension in the writing direction. For a horizontal writing direction, it is the width. For a vertical writing direction, it is the height.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(baseFontSizePercentageRelativeToVideoHeight:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a non-negative CFNumber. This is a number holding a percentage of the height of the video frame. For example, a value of 5 indicates that the base font size should be 5% of the height of the video.

Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.name: set(orthogonalLinePositionPercentageRelativeToWritingDirection:)
Classes/VersaPlayerCaptionStyling.html#/.abstract: Value must be a non-negative CFNumber. This is a number expressing the position of the center of the cue relative to the writing direction. The line position is orthogonal (or perpendicular) to the writing direction (that is, for a horizontal writing direction, it is vertical and for a vertical writing direction, is is horizontal). This attribute expresses the line position as a percentage of the dimensions of the video frame in the relevant direction. For example, 0% is the top of the video frame and 100% is the bottom of the video frame for horizontal writing layout.

Classes/VersaPlayer.html#/c:@M@VersaPlay.name: replaceCurrentItem(with:)
Classes/VersaPlayer.html#/c:@M@VersaPlay.abstract: Replace current item with a new one
